1. Question 1  

```{r}
n_dims<- floor(runif(1,3,10))

vec<- c(1:n_dims^2)

sample(vec)

m <- matrix(vec, n_dims, n_dims)
print(m)

m2 <- m
m2<-t(m2)
print(m2)

sum(m[1, ])
mean(m[1, ])
sum(m[n_dims, ])
mean(m[n_dims, ])
```
